title: A Mysterious Man - Overly Strict with Regulations

infobox.Title:: A Mysterious Man - Overly Strict with Regulations
infobox.Japanese title:: 怪人ガチガチ規則男  (Kaijin Gachigachi Kisoku Otoko)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Detective Boys  Wataru Takagi  Kazunobu Chiba  Chiharu Matsubara
infobox.Character design:: Mari Tominaga  Keiko Sasaki (sub-character)  Kumiko Shishido (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Yukiko Iwai as Ayumi Yoshida  Ikue Otani as Mitsuhiko Tsuburaya  Wataru Takagi as Genta Kojima, Wataru Takagi  Isshin Chiba as Kazunobu Chiba  Omi Minami as Chiharu Matsubara  Jun Karasawa as Misa Katayama  Keiichi Nanba as Iwao Iwata  Koichi Kitamura as Okano  Tetsu Shiratori as Osaki  Kunihiko Yasui as Inoue  Rumi Kasahara as Mariko  Naomi Kusumi as Yasaka  Yoshiko Okamoto as Mrs. Yasaka  Masuo Amada as Tsuruma

sections.Situation: An overly strict man is accused of murdering a woman. Is it murder or is it self-defense? Conan must investigate and figure out the truth.

sections.Trivia:
- This is the last episode to use the original TV soundtracks, before switching to the new version in the next episode.
- The car is a 2005 blue Nissan Fuga [Y50].
- Negishi Moving Company reappears at the ending.
